Iron Hands (TCG)

From Bulbapedia, the community-driven Pokémon encyclopedia.
Jump to navigationJump to search
← #0991: Iron Bundle
Pokémon
#0993: Iron Jugulis →

Iron Hands has been featured on 2 different cards since it debuted in the Paradox Rift expansion of the Pokémon Trading Card Game. Iron Hands cards are normally Lightning-type Basic Pokémon.

List of Pokémon cards featuring Iron Hands

Iron Hands
Cards listed with a blue background are only legal to use in the current Expanded format.
Cards listed with a green background are legal to use in both the current Standard and Expanded formats.
Card Type Mark English
Expansion 		Rarity # Japanese
Expansion 		Rarity #
Iron Hands Temporal Forces 061/162 Future Miraidon ex Starter Deck & Build Set   006/053
Iron Hands
Card Type Mark English
Expansion 		Rarity # Japanese
Expansion 		Rarity #
Iron Hands Paradox Rift 070/182 Future Flash 027/066
Paradox Rift 223/182 Future Flash 079/066
Paradox Rift 248/182 Future Flash 088/066
Prismatic Evolutions 031/131 Terastal Fest ex 054/187
Prismatic Evolutions 154/131 Terastal Fest ex 210/187


This article is part of Project TCG, a Bulbapedia project that aims to report on every aspect of the Pokémon Trading Card Game.
